category.category_uz: Non va non mahsulotlarini ishlab chiqarish

title: Inverter double speed dough mixer US-SXH-20
title_uz: Inverter motorli xamir uchun mikser US-SXH-20
title_en: Inverter double speed dough mixer US-SXH-20
short_description: This mixer is equipped with an inverter motor and operates at 220V voltage. The mouth of the mixing bowl is protected and if this protection is opened accidentally, the equipment will stop working automatically. The power of the equipment is 1.1kw and it can mix dough up to 8kg.
short_description_uz: Ushbu mikser inverter motor bilan jihozlangan va 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi. Aralashtiruvchi idish og'zi himoyalangan va agar ushbu himoya bexosdan ochilsa uskuna avtomatik ravishda ishlashdan to'xtaydi. Uskunaning quvvati 1.1kw va 8kg gacha bo'lgan xamirni aralashtira oladi.
short_description_ru: Миксер оснащен инверторным двигателем и работает от напряжения 220 В. Горловина чаши для смешивания защищена, и если эта защита случайно откроется, оборудование автоматически перестанет работать. Мощность оборудования составляет 1,1 кВт, оно позволяет замешивать тесто весом до 8 кг.
short_description_en: This mixer is equipped with an inverter motor and operates at 220V voltage. The mouth of the mixing bowl is protected and if this protection is opened accidentally, the equipment will stop working automatically. The power of the equipment is 1.1kw and it can mix dough up to 8kg.
long_description:
This mixer is equipped with an inverter motor and operates at 220V voltage. The mouth of the mixing bowl is protected and if this protection is opened accidentally, the equipment will stop working automatically. The power of the equipment is 1.1kw and it can mix dough up to 8kg.

 

Basic parameters
Model.................................................................................................... US-SXH-20
Voltage 220V....................................................................
Rate frequency 50Hz
Input power 1.1kW
Mixing speed 107 / 230 rpm
Max. kneading 8kg
Dimension 670*410*880mm
Weight 83kg
long_description_uz:
Ushbu mikser inverter motor bilan jihozlangan va 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi. Aralashtiruvchi idish og'zi himoyalangan va agar ushbu himoya bexosdan ochilsa uskuna avtomatik ravishda ishlashdan to'xtaydi. Uskunaning quvvati 1.1kw va 8kg gacha bo'lgan xamirni aralashtira oladi.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model.................................................................................................... US-SXH-20
Kuchlanishi 220V....................................................................
Chastota tezligi 50Hz
Quvvati 1.1kW
Aralashtirish tezligi 107 / 230 marta/min
Maks. aralashtirish vazni 8kg
O'lchami 670*410*880mm
Vazni 83kg
long_description_ru:
Миксер оснащен инверторным двигателем и работает от напряжения 220 В. Горловина чаши для смешивания защищена, и если эта защита случайно откроется, оборудование автоматически перестанет работать. Мощность оборудования составляет 1,1 кВт, оно позволяет замешивать тесто весом до 8 кг.

 

Общие параметры
Модель.................................................................................................... US-SXH-20
Напряжение 220В....................................................................
Частота 50Гц
Мощность 1.1кВт
Скорость смешивания 107 / 230 раз/мин
Макс. вес смешивания 8кг
Размер 670*410*880мм
Масса 83кг
long_description_en:
This mixer is equipped with an inverter motor and operates at 220V voltage. The mouth of the mixing bowl is protected and if this protection is opened accidentally, the equipment will stop working automatically. The power of the equipment is 1.1kw and it can mix dough up to 8kg.

 

Basic parameters
Model.................................................................................................... US-SXH-20
Voltage 220V....................................................................
Rate frequency 50Hz
Input power 1.1kW
Mixing speed 107 / 230 rpm
Max. kneading 8kg
Dimension 670*410*880mm
Weight 83kg
